TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StateMachineWorkflowActivity extends System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 做為狀態機器工作流程的根容器。

span.span: Serves as the root container for state machine workflows.

summary.span: 包含事件驅動的活動和狀態。

span.span: Contains event-driven activities and states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 是活動容器，用於建立遵循狀態機器模型的工作流程。The is an activity container used to create workflows that follow a state machine model. 為 ，也就是說， 可以包含其他活動。The is a , which means the can contain other activities. 和 活動是唯一允許的 的子活動。The and the activities are the only permitted child activities of the . 活動已允許，因為根活動本身的行為就和狀態一樣。 activities are permitted because the root activity itself behaves like a state. 因此，根層級中可以有 活動， 中所有狀態活動都會使用這些活動。Therefore, you can have activities at the root level that are used by all the State activities in the . 這個層級上的 活動會提供全域機制來處理工作流程事件，並自動轉換狀態。 activities at this level provide a global mechanism for processing workflow events and automate state transitions. 活動提供機制來定義模型中的各種階段。 activities provide a mechanism to define the various stages in the model. 有執行狀態機器工作流程所需的屬性。The has properties that are required for the execution of the state machine workflow. 最值得注意的是， 有兩個重要的屬性，分別是 和 。Most notably, the has two properties that are important: and . 狀態機器的 ，就是在建立狀態機器的執行個體時，狀態機器當時所處的狀態。The of the state machine is the state in which the state machine is when an instance of the state machine is created. 屬性為強制的，且必須在建立 時提供。The property is mandatory and must be provided when a is created. 狀態機器的 就像任何其他包含在狀態機器內的狀態活動一樣。The of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine. 狀態活動可以是 根活動的直接子系，且 只能有一個 。The state activity can be a direct child of the root activity and a can have only one . 的 是 活動，指定做為 的結束狀態。The of the is a activity that is designated as the end state of the . 在轉換 時，會完成工作流程執行。When a transition is made to the , the workflow execution is completed. 並非強制。The is not mandatory. 這表示您有未完成的 。This means that you can have a that is not completed. 這不表示狀態機器工作流程在記憶體中永遠為使用中。This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory. 可能會在 等待事件時將其卸載。The might be unloaded as it waits for an event. 永遠不會完成的 活動在處理長期執行的商務異動時特別有用，例如供應商收到採購單的狀況時。 activities that never complete are especially useful in processing long running business transactions, as in the case of a purchase order received by a supplier. 完成採購單並不表示採購單流程結束。The fact that the purchase order was fulfilled does not mean that the purchase order process is over. 採購單完成後，採購單上的貨物可能退回，或者會修改採購單並加入額外的商品。The goods that are part of the purchase order might be returned or the purchase order might be amended and have additional items added to it after the fulfillment. 有時需要延長保留採購單的時間，以供法律或其他目的之用。Sometimes there might be a requirement to keep the purchase order records for an extended period of time for legal or other purposes. 工作流程未完成只是表示工作流程仍然維持在卸載狀態。The fact that a workflow does not finish just means that the workflow remains in an unloaded state. 某些情況下可能需要停用工作流程，這表示在一段時間之後，會強制關閉工作流程執行個體。There may be a case for retiring the workflows, which means that after a set period of time the workflow instance may be forced to shut down. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體，並用它實作可在三個狀態之間轉換的基本狀態機器。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class and use it to implement a basic state machine to transition between three states. 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 簡單狀態機器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。For more information, see [Simple State Machine](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在轉換 時，會完成工作流程執行。When a transition is made to the , the workflow execution is completed. 並非強制。The is not mandatory. 這表示您有未完成的 。This means that you can have a that is not completed. 這不表示狀態機器工作流程在記憶體中永遠為使用中。This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory. 可能會在 等待事件時將其卸載。The might be unloaded as it waits for an event. 如需 和 的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about and , see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示如何設定 屬性的值。The following code example shows how to set the value of the property. 這個程式碼範例是 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 簡單狀態機器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。For more information, see [Simple State Machine](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e). summary.span: 取得目前所執行 的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the currently executing .
The name of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從工作流程存取時 (例如，從 活動中的程式碼處理常式存取)， 屬性只會傳回目前狀態的名稱。The property only returns the name of the current state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a activity. 屬性無法在主機程式碼上運作，因為主機只能存取工作流程定義的複本，而且永遠無法存取實體執行個體樹狀結構。The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, and never to the live instance tree. 如需如何判斷目前的狀態，從主應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information about how to determine the current state from the host, see the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 `DynamicUpdateCondition` 屬性。The following example shows how to set the `DynamicUpdateCondition` property. 這個範例來自＜訂購狀態機器 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Ordering State Machine SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 訂購狀態機器範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c)。For more information, see [Ordering State Machine Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59272cf4-bc98-439c-bcfa-b66999ebce5c). The name of the previous .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從工作流程存取時 (例如，從 中的程式碼處理常式存取)， 屬性只會傳回先前狀態的名稱。The property only returns the name of the previous state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a . 屬性無法在主機程式碼上運作，因為主機只能存取工作流程定義的複本，而且永遠無法存取實體執行個體樹狀。The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, never to the live instance tree. 如需如何判斷先前的狀態，從主應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性類別。For more information about how to determine the previous state from the host, see the property of the class.
